text: 13.4 Lom 12.19, 1 Te 4.6 Gapman bɨawl okok, kɨli God bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok mɨdɨl, nɨbop gɨtep gel mɨdtep gɨpɨm. Nɨbi pen gɨ tɨmel gɨl nɨm, gapman bɨawl okok kɨlop pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb. Nɨb nepɨm, gapman bɨawl okok kɨli kɨles mɨdɨl, binɨb tɨmel okok kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨpal. Wog anɨb ak yokɨp ma mɨdebal, kɨles gɨl gɨpal. Kɨli God bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok mɨdɨl, binɨb gɨ tɨmel gɨpal okok kɨlop yul awl ñɨnɨgabal.
